verses.roman:
avicintya-śakti-yukta śrī-bhagavān
icchāya jagad-rūpe pāya pariṇāma

synonyms: avicintya—inconceivable; śakti—potency; yūkta—possessed of; śrī—the affluent; bhagavān—Personality of Godhead; icchāya—by His wish; jagat-rūpe—in the form of the cosmic manifestation; pāya—becomes; pariṇāma—transformed by His energy.
translation: "The Supreme Personality of Godhead is opulent in all respects. Therefore by His inconceivable energies He has transformed the material cosmic manifestation.
